recommendations.reasoning: northamerica-northeast1 costs $14/year more in transfer fees compared to the source region us-east1 ($0/year). However, it offers an extreme emissions reduction of 86.9kg CO2/year (from 91.9kg/year to 5.0kg/year), which is a 94.5% reduction.
